samgr_lite.h
============

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Samgr <samgr.md>`__

**Description:**

Manages system capabilities.

This is used when services, features, and functions are registered with
and discovered by Samgr.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p894106434084832">

BOOTSTRAP_SERVICE “Bootstrap”

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1257954897084832">

Starts a bootstrap service, which is used by samgr and implemented by
system service developers.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </tbody>

.. raw:: html

   </table>

   <p id="p2034686413084832">

typedef enum BootMessage

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p997155246084832">

Enumerates the IDs of the message to be processed for starting the
bootstrap service.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

   <tr id="row1036456143084832">
